title: Baseball Talk, John McCain, Chick-fil-A, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Carla's Power Update, Boxer Curtis Harper, Michelle Obama, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Baseball Talk, John McCain, Chick-fil-A, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Carla's Power Update, Boxer Curtis Harper, Michelle Obama, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Monday's show opens up and goes into Big Dog talking about baseball. Senator John McCain passed away over the weekend. Uncle Steve works the drive thru at Chick-fil-A. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Steve VS Tommy. Miss Carla talks about the latest on Power. Heavyweight boxer Curtis Harper walks out after one second due to a payment dispute. Michelle Obama is teaming with celebrities to launch a voter registration initiative. Closing Remarks today covers keeping it moving no matter what and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
